name: Flick Soccer 22
summary:
Play soccer with ultimate control, realistic ball physics and incredible graphics. Fun gameplay across five addicting game modes including nail-biting free kicks, arcade style target practice, and insane soccer skills in the crossbar challenge.
The beautiful game is more dazzling than ever with all new graphics and state-of-the-art special effects, including depth of field and bloom. New design, new players and fields, different times of day, weather conditions including rain and snow, new classic and pro soccer balls, even more uniforms and player animations.
